title: Global lemon and lime production 2000 to 2017
summary: Overall Production in million metric tons has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Production in million metric tons, about 17.35 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Production in million metric tons about 12.3 was reached at Year 2002, and 2004
min_summary: Overall Production in million metric tons has increased over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Production in million metric tons has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Production in million metric tons, about 17.35 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Production in million metric tons about 12.3 was reached at Year 2002, and 2004
